reporter_caption.center: PEOPLE EX REL. STANLEY v. MURPHY, 6 A.D.2d 1023 [4th Dept 1958]

caption.center: THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK ex rel. LESLIE STANLEY, JR., Appellant,
against ROBERT E. MURPHY, as Warden of Auburn Prison, Respondent.

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, Fourth Department.

opinion.opinion_text: Motion to appeal on original record and for other relief denied on the ground that the papers fail to show merit to the appeal.
